Plot: In 1944 in Tuscany, a group of boxers facing the disasters of the Second World War, during the intrusive presence of the Germans and the Americans, organizes rigged matches to make some money and travel from town to town, hoping to participate in local fairs. A young black American soldier, believed missing, and a girl who refused to marry accompany the ramshackle group.
produced_by: Mario Cecchi Gori, Vittorio Cecchi Gori
starring: Paolo Villaggio, Massimo Ceccherini, Paolo Hendel
written_by: Leo Benvenuti, Mario Monicelli, Piero De Bernardi, Suso Cecchi D'Amico
